docs.text:
Slot: condition_code (condition_code) _Condition Code should be from one of a recognized ontology. Multiple codes can be indicated, but should simply be alternative encodings for the same entity such as alternates encodings from other ontologies. _ Recommended ontologies include: SNOMED_CT, HP, OMIM and ORPHA and coded with the corresponding curies * SNOMED : https://bioregistry.io/registry/snomedct * HP : https://bioregistry.io/registry/hp * OMIM : https://bioregistry.io/registry/omim * ORPHA : https://bioregistry.io/registry/orphanet __ URI: https://23id.org/anvil/:condition_code Applicable Classes Name Description Modifies Slot ConditionAssertion Study Meta Data no Properties Range: EnumConditionCode Multivalued: True Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://23id.org/anvil Mappings Mapping Type Mapped Value self https://23id.org/anvil/:condition_code native https://23id.org/anvil/:condition_code LinkML Source name: condition_code definition_uri: anvil:condition_code description: "Condition Code should be from one of a recognized ontology. Multiple\ \ codes can be indicated, but should simply be alternative encodings for the same\ \ entity such as alternates encodings from other ontologies. 
Recommended\ \ ontologies include: SNOMED_CT, HP, OMIM and ORPHA and coded with the corresponding\ \ curies
* SNOMED : https://bioregistry.io/registry/snomedct
* HP : https://bioregistry.io/registry/hp
\ * OMIM : https://bioregistry.io/registry/omim
* ORPHA : https://bioregistry.io/registry/orphanet
" title: condition_code from_schema: https://23id.org/anvil rank: 1000 alias: condition_code domain_of: - ConditionAssertion range: EnumConditionCode required: false multivalued: true
